full_summary:
### Two Environmental Compliance and Management System Auditors

**Contract Title:** W6369-23-X049
**Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence

**Bid Solicitation:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) invites proposals from experienced environmental compliance and management system auditors for a one-year contract with four irrevocable options, allowing Canada to extend the term up to four years.

**Objectives and Tasks:**
The selected bidder will provide professional services in the area of environmental compliance auditing for the Director General of Environment and Sustainable Management (DGESM). The scope of work includes conducting environmental audits based on risk assessment, ensuring compliance with environmental legislation and regulations, and reviewing environmental management systems and processes.

**Contract Requirements:**
The contract will be awarded to the bidder offering the highest combined rating of technical merit (70%) and price (30%). The DND reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Bidders' Requirements:**
Bidders must comply with Treasury Board policies and directives on contracts awarded to former public servants. They must also provide required information in article 2.3 of Part 2 of the bid solicitation document.

**Language and Documents:**
The bid solicitation and all documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

**Contract Status:**
No contract is currently in place for this service. The DND reserves the right not to award a contract, regardless of the proposals received.
